main_definition: Bluetooth is a wireless technology standard used for exchanging data over short distances using short-wavelength radio waves, commonly referred to as Bluetooth devices or connections.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to the proprietary wireless communication protocol and standards
meanings_and_examples.example: My phone connects automatically with other Bluetooth devices.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A metaphorical term for something that is not directly related, yet works together seamlessly
meanings_and_examples.example: Their collaboration was like a bluetooth device; they didn't always agree but worked well together.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal reference to an outdated or obsolete technology
meanings_and_examples.example: My grandfather still uses his old Bluetooth headphones, even though the newer models are available.
